definition: "Zuvor" refers to a temporal adverb that denotes a specific time or event that occurred before another mentioned time or event. It is commonly used to indicate a previous action, occurrence, or state in relation to a subsequent one.

examples.german: Ich war zuvor noch nie in Berlin.
examples.english: I had never been to Berlin before.

examples.german: Er hatte zuvor schon Erfahrung in diesem Bereich.
examples.english: He had previous experience in this field.

examples.german: Zuvor hatte sie immer Angst vor Hunden.
examples.english: She used to be afraid of dogs before.

examples.german: Ich muss zuvor noch ein paar Dinge erledigen.
examples.english: I have to take care of a few things beforehand.

examples.german: Zuvor war das Geb√§ude ein Krankenhaus.
examples.english: The building used to be a hospital before.
